thread.title: Winmate Introduces Rugged, Flexible Vehicle-Mount Computers
thread.title_full: Winmate Introduces Rugged, Flexible Vehicle-Mount Computers

author: Beth Cochran
title: Winmate Introduces Rugged, Flexible Vehicle-Mount Computers
text:
Winmate , a global leader in developing advanced, rugged mobile technologies, has introduced two new forklift and in-cab mounted computers, specifically designed to provide the most flexibility in docking, connectivity and serviceability. The new FM08 and FM10 feature Intel’s quad-core processor and multiple operating system options ranging from windows CE version 7 to the latest Windows 10. Designed for the supply chain and logistic applications, the rugged vehicle-mount computers fit seamlessly into forklifts, trucks, and various lifts for inventory pickers, to streamline ordering and inventory management, improve operational efficiencies, and improve safety. The industrial-grade FM08 and FM10 were designed for usability in the vehicle with versatility in mounting and the ability to quickly dismount without having to unplug any connectors. The computers also feature a 4-hour back-up battery, multiple I/Os, a unique key-lock feature, and robust processing power from Intel’s 1.91GHz Atom E3845. The 10.4-inch display of the FM10 and 8-inch display of the FM08 offer GFG resistive-touch screens, operable with gloved hands. Built for advanced computing in the supply chain environment, the vehicle-mount computers also offer full QWERTY keyboards, front-facing cameras for face recognition and voice log-in, and multiple operating system options with Windows CE, Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 10.
“Supply chain environments have unique needs and the right technology will ensure the operational flow runs as efficiently and error-free as possible,” said Khalid Kidari, vice president of Winmate. “The easy and versatile docking options, along with the powerful computing and advanced communication features of the FM08 and FM10 will prove a tremendous asset in any vehicle operating in the supply chain.”
The FM08 VMC and FM10 VMC features a u-Blox M8N GPS module, and wireless connectivity with built-in Bluetooth 4.0 and comprehensive 802.11a/b/g/n/ac dual band WiFi.
The new Winmate series was also designed with durability and flexibility in mind with a sturdy magnesium housing built to withstand extreme temperatures, shock, vibration and drops. The FM08 and FM10 are also sealed to IP65 for protection against water and dust.
On October 28, 2015, Winmate will host a webinar, “How to Choose the Right Warehouse Technology to Increase ROI,” in coordination with Conference-Edge. During the webinar, attendees will learn about how to leverage technology in the vehicle to streamline supply chain processes. To register for the webinar, click here .
More information, visit Winmate’s product page .
About Winmate
Founded in 1996, Winmate Communications, Inc. is a Taiwan-based company and a global leader in developing advanced, rugged mobile technologies for a variety of industries ranging from transportation and logistics, vehicle diagnostic, supply chain, field service, warehouse, retail, and healthcare. The company specializes in research and development, engineering and manufacturing to provide custom and enterprise-ready solutions. With offices in Irvine, Atlanta, Toronto, and China, Winmate services customers throughout the world. For more information, visit http:// [ http://www.winmate-rugged.com
